text: This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of for the Prefecture of Saga. ==National Cultural Properties== As of 1 March 2015, thirteen Important Cultural Properties with sixteen component structures have been designated, being of national significance. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !width="25%" align="left" | Property
